column1: Smoque BBQ////Most of the meat is lean here. The pulled pork was delicious. I really enjoyed the crispy pieces. The chopped and sliced brisket were also very good. Two of our orders of sliced brisket were lean and one wasn't
column2: so the brisket is not totally consistent. In all
column3: the meat was tender and had a nice smoke flavor. The only thing I didn't care for was the Texas sausage. It wasn't memorable; it tasted like a regular sausage.
